GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an array of one article provided from its article_id including a comment_count property that represents the number of comments for the article

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.desciption: serves an array of comments for the given article_id

comment.body: This is a bad article name

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.desciption: adds a comment to an article for the given article_id, the author and body are required

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.desciption: deletes a comment by the given comment_id, reponding with a 204 and no content
